reviews.review: es una BOMBA

[h1]Portal 1[/h1] - это первая игра головоломка, от Valve, которая является как по мне шедевром. Хоть по строению она довольно таки простая (пара реплик, комната с головоломкой), она сделана качественно.
[h1]Плюсы[/h1]
1) [b]Уровни[/b], по стилистике они практически одинаковы, однако большинство уровней заставляют реально задуматься, о решении.
2) [b]Юмор[/b]: он здесь присутствует, и довольно таки неплохой. Правда в [b]сиквеле[/b], его достаточно больше.
3) [b]Сюжет[/b]: Он интересен, и сделан не на отвяжись.
4) [b]Геймплей[/b]: Как по мне является [b]эталоном[/b] всех головоломок.
5) [b]Локализация[/b]: сделано довольно таки добротно (кроме озвучки).
6) [b]Саундтрек[/b]: атмосферный, напрягающий.
[h1]Минусы[/h1]
1) [b]Озвучка русской локализации[/b]: Она не такая ужасная как в Mass Effect 1, но и одновременно не шоколад. Сейчас поясню:
Я буду придираться не к голосу актрисы, которую обработали. Проблема другая. [b]Интонация[/b] - она озвучена с головы до ног, вся [b]одной[/b] интонацией.  Троллинг в сторону Челл не такой убедительный, модули озвучены также как и Гладос, что становиться не понятно, кто-что из них хочет сказать, когда Гладос, и модуль (тортика или любопытства) говорят параллельно друг с другом. В общем, хотите услышать нормальную озвучку ? Переводите в настройках игры озвучку на английскую, включайте субтитры и играете.
[h1] Итог[/h1]
Portal 1 - вообще является технодемкой, а не полной игрой. Поэтому она короткая.
[h1]Оценка[/h1]
9/10 - за короткость игры, и ужасную озвучку.

Score: 10.0

Great puzzle game, the idea is original and even though it doesn't look the best, let's be honest, they spent way more time doing the physics for a brand new idea than desining pretty textures.

Вновь аплодирую Valve стоя! Шедевр за шедевром выходят из их студии уже на протяжении 18 лет! И Portal не исключение. Эту игру не описать словами, в нее должен поиграть каждый! Атмосфера, сюжет, юмор, восхитительный, не похожий на другие игры, геймплей, графика (на то время), все это на высоте. №3 в списке любимых игр, Must have не только для фанатов Valve, но и для любого геймера в мире!
10\10

otimo jogo

This is an absolutely fantastic game. I highly recommend anyone play it. I personally only recently completed it and I'm currently enjoying the Challenge and Advanced modes. While it is a short game (4-12 hours depending on how much of the bonus features you toy with), it is a very rich experience. Therefore, upon completion you have a deep sense of satisfaction rather than feeling cheated out of a full game.

One thing I must mention is that this game is [b]creepy[/b]. Portal has been dissected and discussed by the gaming community to an extreme ever since it was released. And, while I was prepared for 99% of the games qualities prior to playing it, the one thing I certainly wasn't prepared for was the sense of unease you experience while exploring the sparse environments of Aperture Science.
Great fun, good story - short game (6 hours maybe) but worth it

Portal definitely implements some of the most original mechanics with the seemingly simple portal gun. The game's clever puzzles will have you clamoring to find a solution with every test. This game is awesome. Two thumbs up!
Even know that I did beat this game in about 3 hours, it was the most fun I have ever had in months.
This is difficult, but interesting, I would recommend you look in once

Also you learn how to destroy your mind and get the feeling of breaking your computer. This review isn't that helpful, but lets you know what I had felt while playing Portal.
Alntough the last couple of test chambers are somewhat hard for normal game players like me, I really love it. The humor of the robotic voice talking to you. The turrents reactions are hilarious.

Of course this game has been out for a long time and it took me until I got Steam to play it. Before that I had watched a few people play Portal and heard so many things about it.

While it can be a little disorienting sometimes it was a lot of fun. The controls were easy to get used to and the puzzles were challenging enough for someone who hadn't played a game like it before.

If you like platform games and/or 3D puzzles this is definitely a game to try. I would personally give it a 9/10.

Um ótimo jogo.

I believe Portal started as a side project to Half Life 2 as part of The Orange Box (which you can tell by how short the main story is), nevertheless, the game has unique gameplay, awesome atmosphere and is quite humorous. The puzzles are not too complex but rather fun to solve (of course, there are also much harder bonus challenges). It probably won't keep you entertained for more than a few hours (maybe 10 if you also complete the achievements), but it will get you into the main story and you'll have a great time beating it. After that you can move on to Portal 2 which is much more evolved and has great Co-op. If you see it on sale don't hesitate to buy it or even get the whole Bundle - it's well worth the money.

Now you're thinking with portals :)

This game is excellent, both in plot and gameplay! It is a must play and a classic puzzle game that keeps you thinking. The graphics aren't stellar but it is an older game.

I would buy this game if I were you.
É PORTAL CARA!

Portal is a fascinating puzzle game that was first introduced in the Orange Box, a bundle of random Valve games like Half Life and Team Fortress 2. The story is that you play the role of a test subject, Chell, trapped in an abandoned building known as Apature Science. A mysterious voice instructs you to go through several test chambers with the use of a portal gun, a device that can shoot portals in order to teleport one place to another. So it all relies on your skill and brain power in order to escape Apature alive, while enjoying some cake for your victory... maybe. As the name states, the game is all about portals. Wether it be using portals to get to a higher area, or to get a weighted cube to hold down a switch, it's always fun to just mess around with the portal gun. There are 19 Levels and most of the puzzles are pretty easy, so it's a short game. There are also advanced maps and time trials that'll keep ya busy if you think the game is too easy. While it's sequel is much more popular, it's predecessor is still fun to play.

POS YOCASE A MÍ ME HA PARECIDO REQUETEBONICO. A VECES ME MAREAO UN POCO CON LO SALTO PARRIBA Y PABAJO Y CASI VOMITO Y TO ESO. Y BUENO HAN HABIDO RATEJOS QUE EL GARBANCICO ME HA HECHAO UNA POCA DE HUMO, Y OLÍA A CHURRUSCAOMAL, APARTE DE QUE ME HA DAO MUCHISMA CALOR. PERO MUY MIEN EH? AL FINAL HASTA ME HE SENTÍO MALAMENTE, PORQUE LA TÍA LOS CABLES Y YO POS HABÍAMOS HACIDO MUY BUENOS RATOS AHÍ CON LO CUBILETES, CON LO PIUM PIUM, Y CON EL CORRE CORRE QUE TE PILLO. Y PARA UN PUTO JUEBO QUE ME TERMINO AHORA RESULTA QUE NO HAY NINGÚN CHECO CONECTAO Y AHORA A QUIEN SE LO CUENTO EH? EH? MUY MAL JODAR. OYE Y QUE BONICA LA CANCIÓN DEL FINAL ARA QUE MACUERDO. TITUTUTITU PIM PIM PIM PIM PIM PIM TITUTAAAAAAAAATUTAAAAAAAATUTAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA.

Um jogo de desafia a inteligência dos jogadores. Portal traz uma série de desafios onde o foco é a melhor maneira de resolver usando portais. A história do jogo também é envolvente apesar de não ser tão profunda, ligações históricas com Half-Life deixa a trama com cara de conspiração. Os gráficos são bons, usando a mesma tecnologia Source do Half-Life. Fragmentos da história são vistas em várias partes do jogo, um bom exercício para juntar todas as peças desse quebra cabeça que é a Aperture Science.
